verses.text: Happy \w are|strong="H7563"\w* \w those|strong="H3427"\w* \w who|strong="H3427"\w* \w do|strong="H1870"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w follow|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, \w not|strong="H3808"\w* halting \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* frequented \w by|strong="H1870"\w* \w sinners|strong="H2400"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w taking|strong="H1980"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w seat|strong="H4186"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* gathering \w of|strong="H3427"\w* scoffers.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* joy, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* study \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3119"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H4325"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* \w planted|strong="H8362"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* runlets \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, \w yielding|strong="H6213"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w due|strong="H5921"\w* \w season|strong="H6256"\w*, \w leaves|strong="H5929"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w fading|strong="H5034"\w*. \w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*, \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w prosper|strong="H6743"\w*.

\w Not|strong="H3808"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w* fare \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w*; \w like|strong="H3651"\w* \w chaff|strong="H4671"\w* \w are|strong="H7563"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w*, blown \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w will|strong="H6662"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w stand|strong="H6965"\w* firm \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w sinners|strong="H2400"\w* appear, \w when|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w are|strong="H7563"\w* gathered.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* dear \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* end \w in|strong="H3068"\w* ruin.
